data.element:
This interactive game can be entirely played using mouse on Pcs. Or you can use touch to emulate click on touch devices.

You need to select (click / tap), hogs coming out from the ground.

Points are awarded depending upon your quickness of selection of the hog.

You need to select atleast 2/3 hogs to proceed to next level, your score doesnot count as element to proceed to next level.

As you proceed to next level the speed of hogs increses.

Level 5 is unbeatable.
Ha HAH ha ha ! You failed to kill 2/3 groundhogs in this level. Try again!
